title: Are they planning to re-surface all of Lansdowne Road, Masonboro Loop Road and Navaho Trail or are they going to just leave it patched?
text: Hello. Sorry for the delay in answering your question from early October. Here's a link to the answer to your question. As you'll see from the answer, DOT is still waiting on a full schedule for the project. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=4324
